response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $14,500 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any other way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 14500}
